menuItems.name: Jollof Rice
menuItems.description: Delicious Nigerian Jollof rice served with fried chicken.

menuItems.name: Pounded Yam and Egusi
menuItems.description: Pounded yam served with rich Egusi soup.

menuItems.name: Suya
menuItems.description: Spicy Nigerian street food skewers made with beef or chicken.

menuItems.name: Fried Plantains
menuItems.description: Sweet, crispy fried plantains, also known as dodo.

menuItems.name: Moi Moi
menuItems.description: Steamed bean pudding made with ground beans, spices, and fish or eggs.

menuItems.name: Efo Riro
menuItems.description: A rich vegetable soup made with spinach, peppers, and assorted meats.

menuItems.name: Ofada Rice and Ayamase Sauce
menuItems.description: Local Nigerian rice served with spicy Ayamase sauce.

menuItems.name: Nkwobi
menuItems.description: A spicy cow foot delicacy often enjoyed as a side dish.

menuItems.name: Akara
menuItems.description: Fried bean cakes, a popular Nigerian breakfast option.

menuItems.name: Pepper Soup
menuItems.description: A hot and spicy soup with assorted meats or fish.
